title: Ep 556 | When Jase Caught Some Shrapnel, Catching Si by the Ear & Being Raised by Teenagers
description:
Phil gives update on Miss Kay's hand injury, and Al hurts his own finger while making fun of his mom. Jase recalls breaking an arm and catching shrapnel in the back of the head, and Al recalls being raised by teenagers on a college campus. Jase tells of the time he actually bumped into someone who was the victim of Phil's fishhook mountain technique. Phil addresses the problem of identifying evil spirits as mental illness. Jase discusses the human effort to combat evil, and Al compares people resisting changes to a melting glacier. And Jase tells a hilarious story about catching Si's ear with a fishhook and watching his catlike reflexes!
